about_the_game:
Ys Foliage Ocean in Celceta : Kai, the origin of Ys VIII and Ys IX, is now available on Steam!
The highly-acclaimed Ys action RPG series is renowned for its simple yet exhilarating battles, clear and dramatic story, and fiery BGM that enhances the battle experience.

Originally released in 2012 for PlayStation®Vita, Ys Foliage Ocean in Celceta laid the foundation for the systems used in later series installments, Ys VIII and Ys IX, the latter of which was released in 2019. Now, the classic Ys Foliage Ocean in Celceta : Kai has arrived on Steam!
Equipped with several unique features that were popularized in Ys VIII, such as automatic mapping and Flash Move, which allows you to gain an advantage in battle by dodging enemy attacks at the last moment, don't miss this chance to relive Ys Foliage Ocean in Celceta!

■A Hero Whose Memories Were Lost...!?

The protagonist Adol finds himself afflicted with amnesia!
This action RPG intricately intertwines the player's adventure with Adol's locked-away memories.
Step into the shoes of the red-haired adventurer, Adol Christin, and embark on an expedition through the vast, unexplored expanse of the Foliage Ocean in Celceta with a diverse group of allies.
As your journey progresses, the mysteries of Adol's lost memories and the secrets of an ancient civilization hidden in the Celceta region will gradually come to light!

■60fps with Enhanced Textures and Superior Sound

Experience unparalleled gameplay!
This version boasts significant upgrades, including a smooth 60fps frame rate, sharper textures, and richly enhanced in-game BGM.

■Steam-Optimized Controls and Mini-Games!

Specific gameplay elements have been optimized for Steam, including mini-games and puzzles initially designed for touch controls in the PlayStation®Vita version of Ys Foliage Ocean in Celceta. Controls have been fine-tuned for PC gameplay, such as aligning Extra Skill activation with the intuitive two-button press as in Ys VIII.

■Intuitive Yet Deep, Thrilling Speedy Party Battles!

Engage in strategic and exhilarating party battles with simple controls for flashy skills. A feature to toggle attack or evasion focus for your party members in real-time has been added, enhancing the strategic depth.

■Grow Your Favorite Characters with the Inspiration System and Weapon Upgrades!

Unleash new skills automatically in battle with the Inspiration System as you face off against tough enemies, awakening your characters' hidden potentials. Adventure brings opportunities to strengthen unique weapons with materials you've collected. Customize and fortify your arsenal to create the ultimate weapon!

■Dodge, Collaborate, and Skillfully Attack!

The game is packed with unique actions that elevate party battles to new heights of strategy and excitement. Enjoy features like Flash Move, which slows enemy movement with precise dodging, and Aerial Combo, allowing for relentless attacks on airborne foes!
